mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SHOP ( PRODUCT_NM, WRITER, PRICE, DISCOUNT_RATE, STOCK, SORT, DELIVERY_PRICE, DELIVERY_METHOD, CONTENT, PRODUCT_FILE, ENROLL_DT ) VALUES ( #(productNm), #(writer), #(price), #(discountRate), #(stock), #(sort), #(deliveryPrice), #(deliveryMethod), #(content), #(productFile), NOW() )
